title: Prisma db pull executor
description: The db pull command connects to your database and adds Prisma models to your Prisma schema that reflect the current database schema.

schema.description: Specifies the path to the desired schema.prisma file to be processed instead of the default path. Both absolute and relative paths are supported.

force.description: Force overwrite of manual changes made to schema. The generated schema will be based on the introspected schema only.

print.description: Prints the created schema.prisma to the screen instead of writing it to the filesystem.
